comment._content:
WOW! This is my grandfather. He married Augusta Gormley and they are the parents of Violet Hughes, Louis Milton Hughes, the little boy in the picture,and Josephine Hughes, my mother.

Thank you for a lovely surprise, 

Steffia@comcast..net

comment.author: 37784107@N08
comment._content: I'm glad you found this photo! And thank you so much for the supplemental information about your grandfather. We didn't have the names of your grandfather's other family members, so I've added them. You might also be interested in seeing your mother in our yearbook collection. Here's a link to her senior picture.
